entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • can't use @onchange inside RenderFragment, bind works #39288
  • Docker Compose The path must be absolute #39286
  • Warnings when running a .NET 7 Blazor app #39283
    .NET 7.0
  • ANCM + ARM64 Tracking #39281
    .NET 7.0
  • Idea on improving WebAssembly Performance #39277
    Discussions
  • Slow first page load when porting asp.net core from .net 5 to .net 6 #39272
    6.0.x
  • DefaultHealthCheckService never logs exceptions from degraded HealtCheckResults #39271

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpContext)HttpContext). Session #39233
  • Identity Specification Tests Issues #39050
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM, ongoing timers cause a global exception when browser loses focus for some time #39089
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter has incorrect behavior in case of user-added EventHandler #37323
    Backlog
  • HttpContext.Response.Body writes an empty NewLine when no bytes were written #37922
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: updates #39268
  • A better implementation to the definition of IUrlHelper.IsLocalUrl #39119
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Rendering Razor component in server mode in MVC project in partial view - left with empty tag -> related to issues 20332 (unresolved) , 13771 #39214
  • I have searched the existing issues #39278
  • Perf regression: json_netty #39256
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #39262
  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS and OPT_NO_LTS from Installers #38077
    .NET 7 Planning
  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #39264
  • Blazor wasm PWA runs under LAN and there is no installation icon button #39222
  • Duplicate Razor Component Page value causes Object reference not set to an instance of an object in _Host.cshtml #39228
  • HttpClient functionality difference between VS 2019 and VS 2022 #39232
  • As an HTTP API developer using Open API to enable integration, my APIs include an opinionated convention of ensuring operationId attributes are created for each Web API controller method #27591
    Backlog
  • Due to seasonal holidays, many of our members are taking time off. Please expect delayed responses until early January. #38711
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #39254
  • There is no registered service of type 'System.Net.Http.IHttpClientFactory'. <- Error on Blazor Server #39265

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39287
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Enforce warnings for unused usings #39280
    7.0-preview1
  • Update to SDK v7.0.100-alpha.1.22053.1 #39285
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d81ae2f` to `6b74da4` #39273
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Identity stores tests fixes #39088
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Hard-Code BaselineTest to use 2.1.30 #39279
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.32
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter checks for ErrorContext.Handled flag (#37323) #39275
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Add MIT License Headers to `Components/Web.JS/**/*.ts` Files #39164
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Migrate JSInterop to ESLint #39162
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS/LTS #39141
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39260
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.2
  • Fix typo xml comments #39276
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • Use NullabilityInfoContext in DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider #39219
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39075
    area-blazor
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39259
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39258
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Support DefaultStatusCode annotation on methods #39255
    area-mvc
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] ANCM: Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0
  • Fix: InputRadioGroup not registering initial click in some circumstances #39208
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #39209
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update Mvc to use LoggerMessageAttribute #38658
    area-mvc, community-contribution
